description:
Fleetly is the best app to reach your fitness goals. Earn points for logging your workouts, connect with friends and join challenges at all levels, from beginner to pro. Featured in LifeHacker, Mashable, Fitness Magazine, Ubergizmo, VentureBeat, CNET, UrbanDaddy, and Huffington Post’s “Best strength training app”.

Works with RunKeeper, Nike+, Fleetly.com, and the Withings Wi-Fi Body Scale.

Fleetly supports the full spectrum of fitness activities from yoga to weight training and from table tennis to long-distance running.

What people are saying:
★★★★★  “Best of all the fitness apps, by far.”
★★★★★  “Great workout motivator. Love that I can bring it to the gym and easily record weight and reps as I workout.”
★★★★★  “I love this app. The community features make all the difference.”
★★★★★  “Love Fleetly. All the different workouts & challenges keep it exciting.”

Whether you’re training for an Ironman or just trying to get off the couch, Fleetly can help by making fitness fun, accessible, and friendly.

DISCOVER
Find new exercises and workouts using our professionally written detailed descriptions and HD instructional videos. 
Use the custom Workout Generator to create personalized workouts based on your fitness goals, available time and available equipment. The built-in Coach tells you how much weight and how many reps to do, based on your ability level and progress. You can even set it to take it easy or push you based on how you feel on any particular day.

TRACK
Whatever your fitness level or goal, Fleetly analyzes your body, your progress and plateaus, your training log – from time exercised, to weight lifted to reps, and more – to provide you with your individual Fitness Level, a single number that summarizes your physical fitness, to show you how you are progressing towards your goals, and see how you stack up to others.
 Your data is automatically synchronized to www.fleetly.com, where you can see charts of your progress and find workout recommendations. 
 
CHALLENGE
Join an existing workout challenge, or create your own and invite your friends to join. Then track your progress, compete with friends on the leaderboard, and earn medals for your achievements.   You can even earn real rewards from Kiip!
